name: New York Millennials Simulator
description:
Hello and welcome to the New York Millennials Simulator! Have an accurate New York Millennials Blaseball experience in the comfort of your own home! Please note that this is a fan-made game and is not affiliated with the commissioner, who's doing a great job! Not sure what Blaseball is? Check it out here: https://blaseball.com

This is a short Choose Your Own Adventure game. It's similar to the CYOA books you might be familiar with except instead of turning to a page all of the choices are links you can click on.

Generally if you see a link at the bottom of the passage it's a choice you can make. There are also links that are embedded in the story passage text itself. Clicking these provides you with further information or context.

This game was made using the Twine engine and the Chapbook story format. See https://twinery.org/ for more details.

This is the first time I've made a Twine game or uploaded anything to Itch before so if there are any bugs or you have any other difficulties please let me know!
